title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: R201When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browsebutton I get a dialog that does not have a good default folder. It shows methe desktop, my computer, etc... If none, it could point to thedefault content location.
EB: It would be nice if it could remember thelast folder I've imported a project from.
SR: R201When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browsebutton I get a dialog that does not have a good default folder.
